fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.configuration

Class ConfigurationItem<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.configuration.ConfigurationItem<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the stored value.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigurationList, ConfigurationMap, ConfigurationSection

    public class ConfigurationItem<T>
extends Object
    Represents a configuration item stored in the config.yml file.

      • ConfigurationItem

        protected ConfigurationItem(String fieldName,
                            T defaultValue,

      • ConfigurationItem

        public ConfigurationItem(String fieldName,
                         T defaultValue,
                         Class<T> valueType,
                         String... deprecatedNames)
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The path of the field in the config.yml file.
        defaultValue - The default value if this is not defined.
        valueType - The type of the value of this configurationItem, if it can't be deduced from the defaultValue.
        deprecatedNames - A list of deprecated names to migrate the old values automatically.

public static <T> ConfigurationItem<T> item(String fieldName)

      • item

        public static <T> ConfigurationItem<T> item(String fieldName,
                                            T defaultValue,
                                            String... deprecatedNames)
        Utility method to construct a configuration item.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the stored value.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The path of the field in the config.yml file.
        defaultValue - The default value if this is not defined.
        deprecatedNames - A list of deprecated names to migrate the old values automatically.
        Returns:
        A ready-to-use configuration item.

      • item

        public static <T> ConfigurationItem<T> item(String fieldName,
                                            Class<T> type,
                                            String... deprecatedNames)
        Utility method to construct a configuration item.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the stored value.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The path of the field in the config.yml file.
        type - The default value if this is not defined.
        deprecatedNames - A list of deprecated names to migrate the old values automatically.
        Returns:
        A ready-to-use configuration item.

        public T get()
        Gets the defined value for this configuration item.
        Returns:
        the defined value for this configuration item, or the default value if missing.

        Returns a list of deprecated field names.

      • isDefined

        public boolean isDefined()
        Returns true if a value is explicitly set in the configuration file.

      • set

        public T set(T value)
        Updates the value of this configuration item. Saves the change in the configuration file.

        If you don't want to save the update, use set(value, false).

        Parameters:
        value - the new value.
        Returns:
        The previously stored value.
        See Also:
        set(Object, boolean)

      • set

        public T set(T value,
             boolean save)
        Updates the value of this configuration item.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value.
        save - true to save this change in the config file. Be aware that it will save all unsaved changes, including previous values changed with this argument set to false.
        Returns:
        The previously stored value.
